void Locale::Set (  const LocaleData &  locale_data  )  [static]
 

Sets the locale-data with locale_data. Usually the locale-data can be retrieved by invoking LocaleConfig::GetSetting(id), where id specifies the index of the possible range of locale-datas, which may be retrieved by LocaleConfig::GetSettingsCount().
